content: > join my facebook group for community > coupons and cal challenges > > take me to the group 1 yarn lion brand cover story lazy days thick & quick super bulky #6 100% polyester 125 yds/114 m per 8 8 oz/250 g skein color a - eggplant 1 skein color b - cream 3 skein tools us size m/13 9 mm crochet hook stitch markers yarn needle finished sizes 13 across 26 around x 13 tall not including handles stitch key chain s = chain s single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch specialty stitches & techniques blo pattern notes tote is worked in one piece from the bottom up in joined rounds after each round is joined turn this will keep the joined seam straight and the fabric to alternate right and wrong sides keeping the fabric reversible use a stitch marker to mark the top of first st in each round especially to help with joining to replicate color changes shown in example work as follows color a = rounds 1-9 14-16 color b = rounds 10-13 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
